content: Hi all! It was suggested I announce the #process-io stream here. It is a channel I created where users of the (currently still private) beta can ask questions. Feel free to lurk, I'll post occasional updates and we should be opening invites at some point. The https://process.io platform builds on top of https://statebox.org probably familiar to most of you. In short, it will allow you to write software that is structured diagrammatically, using petri nets, monoidal categories and a whole bunch of more stuff.
